name: cancel_subscription
description: Cancels a subscription in Stripe using its ID.

subscription.description: The ID of the subscription to cancel.

name: create_coupon
description: Creates a Stripe coupon by defining a discount using *only one* of `percent_off` or `amount_off` (which requires `currency`, defaulting to 'USD'), and specifying its duration via `duration` ('once', 'repeating', or 'forever'; defaults to 'once') where 'repeating' requires `duration_in_months`.

name.description: Name of the coupon displayed to customers on invoices or receipts.

amount_off.description: A positive integer representing the amount to subtract from an invoice total.

currency.description: A three-letter ISO currency code (e.g., 'USD', 'EUR') for the `amount_off` parameter, required if `amount_off` is used without `percent_off`, and defaults to 'USD'.

duration.description: Specifies how long the discount lasts, accepting 'once', 'repeating', or 'forever'; defaults to 'once'.

percent_off.description: A float representing the percentage discount, ranging from 0 to 100 (inclusive); if provided, this overrides `amount_off` as the coupon's discount method.

duration_in_months.description: Specifies the number of months the discount applies when `duration` is 'repeating'.

name: create_customer
description: Create a customer in Stripe.

email.description: The optional email address of the customer.

name: create_invoice
description: Create an invoice in Stripe for a customer, with an optional number of days until it is due.

customer.description: The customer ID for invoice creation.

days_until_due.description: The number of days until the invoice is due.

name: create_invoice_item
description: Create an invoice item in Stripe using a customer ID, price ID, and invoice ID.

customer.description: The ID of the customer for the invoice item.

price.description: The ID of the price for the item.

invoice.description: The ID of the invoice to create the item for.

name: create_payment_link
description: Creates a Stripe payment link using a price ID and the quantity of the product to include.

price.description: The price ID for the payment link.

quantity.description: The quantity of the product to include, as an integer greater than 0.

name: create_price
description: Create a new Stripe price for an existing product, using the product ID, unit amount (in cents), and currency.

product.description: The ID of the product to create the price for.

currency.description: The three-letter ISO currency code for the price (e.g., 'usd').

unit_amount.description: The price's unit amount in cents, specified as a non-negative integer; defaults to `None`.

name: create_product
description: Creates a product in Stripe, accepting a mandatory name and an optional description.

description.description: An optional string that describes the product.

name: create_refund
description: Refunds a Stripe payment intent using its ID (`payment_intent`: str), with an optional `amount` (int, in cents), and an optional `reason` (str).

payment_intent.description: The ID of the PaymentIntent to refund.

name: finalize_invoice
description: Finalizes an invoice in Stripe using its ID.

invoice.description: The string ID of the invoice to finalize.

name: list_coupons
description: Fetch a list of coupons from Stripe, optionally limited by an integer `limit` between 1 and 100.

limit.description: Limits the number of objects to return, ranging from 1 to 100.

name: list_customers
description: Fetch a list of Stripe Customers, optionally using `limit` to control the number retrieved or `email` for case-sensitive filtering.

limit.description: The maximum number of objects to return, ranging from 1 to 100.

email.description: A case-sensitive string value used to filter the list by the customer's email field.

name: list_disputes
description: Retrieves a list of Stripe disputes, allowing filtering by charge ID or PaymentIntent ID and limiting the number of results.

charge.description: The ID of the charge used to filter disputes.

payment_intent.description: Return disputes associated with the specified PaymentIntent ID; defaults to `None`.

limit.description: The maximum number of objects to return, ranging from 1 to 100, defaulting to 10.

name: list_payment_intents
description: List payment intents in Stripe, optionally for a specific customer or with a specified return limit.

customer.description: The ID of the customer to list payment intents for.

limit.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned, ranging from 1 to 100.

name: list_prices
description: Fetch a list of Prices from Stripe, optionally filtered by a `product` ID and limited by the number of prices to return.

product.description: The ID of the product for which to list prices, defaulting to `None`.

limit.description: Limits the number of objects returned, ranging from 1 to 100; defaults to 10.

name: list_products
description: Fetches a list of Products from Stripe, with an optional `limit` (1-100, default 10) on the number of products returned.

limit.description: Limits the number of objects returned, ranging from 1 to 100, with a default of 10.

name: list_subscriptions
description: List all Stripe subscriptions, filterable by customer ID, price ID, status (active, past_due, unpaid, canceled, incomplete, incomplete_expired, trialing, all), and a result limit between 1 and 100.

customer.description: The ID of the customer to list subscriptions for, formatted as `cus_` followed by an identifier.

price.description: The ID of the price to list subscriptions for, formatted as `price_xxx`.

status.description: The status of subscriptions to retrieve, with possible values: 'active', 'past_due', 'unpaid', 'canceled', 'incomplete', 'incomplete_expired', 'trialing', 'all'.

limit.description: Sets the maximum number of objects to return, ranging from 1 to 100.

name: retrieve_balance
description: Retrieve the balance from Stripe.

name: update_dispute
description: Updates a dispute with new evidence, which can be submitted immediately or staged for later submission via the `submit` parameter; updating any field in the `evidence` hash submits all fields in the hash for review.

dispute.description: The unique identifier of the dispute to update.

cancellation_policy_disclosure.description: Explanation of how and when the customer was shown the refund policy before purchase.

duplicate_charge_explanation.description: An explanation of the difference between the disputed charge and the prior charge considered a duplicate.

evidence.description: An object containing the evidence to upload for a dispute. Updating any field in this object resubmits all of its fields for review.

submit.description: Specifies whether to immediately submit evidence to the bank; if `false`, the evidence is staged on the dispute.

name: update_subscription
description: Updates an existing subscription in Stripe; to change a subscription item, the existing item must be deleted and the new one added.

proration_behavior.description: Specifies how to handle prorations when subscription items change, which must be one of `create_prorations`, `always_invoice`, `none_implicit`, or `none`.

id.description: The ID of the subscription item to modify.

price.description: The ID of the price to switch to.

quantity.description: The quantity of the plan to subscribe to.

items.description: A list of dictionaries, each representing a subscription item to update, add, or remove.
